item.description:
Legal and Regulatory Issues in Corporate-Physician Relations

 

Medical device companies rely on clinical insights from physicians, yet establishing compliant business ties with clinicians can be quite complicated. Legal and regulatory restrictions seem to pile up on an ongoing basis, leading rational, law-abiding businesspeople to second-guess their own judgment in structuring these relationships. In this session we will explore some issues that should be top of mind in planning and implementing these relationships, so as to steer clear of problem areas in state and federal regulations, while maximizing the potential of associations with clinical experts.

 

Speaker:

 



DAVID HARLOW is Principal of The Harlow Group LLC, a health care law and consulting firm based in Boston, MA.

 

Date: July 20, 2011
Time: 5:30 - 8:00PM
Location: Rebecca's Cafe, 275 Grove Street, Auburndale, MA
Info: Judy Isaacson  judy@vitalnow.net

 

http://web.memberclicks.com/mc/community/eventdetails.do?eventId=288199&orgId=meg&recurringId=0
item.name: Legal and Regulatory Issues in Corporate-Physician Relations
